Name: Disposable Service Articles Prohibited
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting restaurants from providing disposable service articles for on-premise eating and drinking use.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


    	Section one.  Title 16 of the administrative code of the city of New York is hereby amended by adding a new section 16-119.1, to follow section 16-119, to read as follows:
    	�16-119.1.  Disposable service articles prohibited.  No restaurant shall provide disposable or non-reusable knives, forks, spoons, glasses, cups, plates and bowls, for food and beverage consumption on the premises of the restaurant.
    	�2. 	This local law shall take effect ninety days after is enactment into law.

Int.395
